headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' https://*.google.com https://*.gstatic.com https://cdn.emailjs.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data: https://*.google.com https://*.gstatic.com; frame-src https://*.google.com https://*.gstatic.com; connect-src 'self' https://api.emailjs.com;
